Character is in a frenzy, increasing swiftness and fervor.
[Key:MultiStrike_LLWEAPONEX_Rapier_FlickerStrike_DisplayName:Flicker Strike] will automatically trigger again, consuming a frenzy charge.

Rapier Mastery I

Critical/Backstab attacks grant +[1] AP once every 2 turns.
